name: Obat Helpers
mission: Our mission is to equip underserved communities in Bangladesh with the tools they need to break free from the cycle of poverty. We do this by providing access to quality education and economic empowerment programs, promoting financial independence and inclusive economic growth. Our ultimate goal is to build a more equitable and prosperous Bangladesh for all.
theoryOfChange: Obat Helpers engages in strategic planning, as indicated by Charity Navigator, which notes their "efficient management and strategic planning" and a "strategic plan for 2022" to reflect changes in strategy based on research. Their website outlines a "judicious and strategic mix of aid, education, vocational training and self-empowerment initiatives" aimed at improving lives and fostering happiness, hope, and self-worth. Their empowerment programs specifically focus on strengthening self-reliance and economic stability through skills training, entrepreneurship, and livelihood support to help individuals achieve sustainable income and financial independence. The organization's mission is to equip underserved communities with tools to break the cycle of poverty through quality education and economic empowerment programs, promoting financial independence and inclusive economic growth.

evaluationSources: Refugee and Migratory Movements Research Unit (RMMRU) - University of Dhaka

zakatClaimEvidence: Dedicated zakat page found at https://obathelpers.org/donate (Source: https://obathelpers.org/donate)

ui_signals_v1.recommendation_rationale: Strong donor fit, low risk profile, and credible supporting evidence for outcomes.

all_citations.claim: OBAT Helpers has a Charity Navigator score of 90.33333333333333/100 and a program expense ratio of 82.1%.
The organization is zakat-eligible and follows specific zakat policies for asnaf categories.
The organization reported total revenue of $2,184,558.
OBAT Helpers operates various educational and training projects alongside health clinics.
The organization continues to manage educational projects and healthcare services as part of its core mission.
Donors can contribute through various giving methods to support empowerment initiatives.
The organization provides volunteer opportunities to engage the community in its mission.

baseline_narrative.amal_score_rationale: With an overall GMG score of 88/100 and a Charity Navigator score of 90.33333333333333/100, OBAT Helpers demonstrates high levels of accountability and financial transparency [1]. The organization maintains a high data confidence rating and efficient operational metrics.
areas_for_improvement: Expanding the scale of health clinic operations to meet growing community needs
Increasing long-term reserve funds beyond the current 5.7 months of working capital

dimension_explanations.alignment: OBAT Helpers shows strong alignment with donor interests, particularly for those seeking zakat-eligible causes related to global education and healthcare [2][10]. The organization's mission to break the cycle of poverty aligns with urgent global needs, earning an alignment score of 46/50 [1].
dimension_explanations.impact: The organization achieves a high impact score of 42/50 by providing direct services, including the operation of health clinics and educational projects [4][5]. With total revenue of $2,184,558, the charity maintains an 82.1% program expense ratio, focusing resources on direct provision of aid [1][3].

baseline_narrative.headline: OBAT Helpers Inc. empowers marginalized communities through comprehensive education, healthcare, and poverty alleviation initiatives.
strengths: High program expense ratio of 82.1%, ensuring the majority of funds reach beneficiaries
Excellent fundraising efficiency with a cost of only $0.06 per $1 raised
Strong financial health with 5.7 months of working capital available
baseline_narrative.summary: OBAT Helpers Inc. is a non-profit organization dedicated to lifting displaced and impoverished communities out of poverty through integrated empowerment and education programs [4][5]. The organization is recognized as zakat-eligible, allowing donors to fulfill their religious obligations through various giving methods [2][9].

areas_for_improvement.detail: The organization has experienced a <cite id="14">3-year revenue CAGR of -11.4%</cite>, suggesting a need for more diversified or stable long-term funding streams.
While overall scores are high, the <cite id="15">Charity Navigator Accountability beacon score of 90</cite> indicates room for improvement in public disclosure policies.

bbb_assessment.summary: The organization maintains audited financial statements and strong governance through a large independent board.

case_against.mitigation_notes: The organization maintains <cite id="12">strong working capital</cite> to buffer against short-term revenue drops.
risk_factors: <cite id="14">Negative 11.4% revenue growth</cite> over three years
<cite id="15">Lower accountability score (90/100)</cite> compared to peers
case_against.summary: The primary concern is the <cite id="14">declining revenue trend</cite> over the last three years, which may impact future program expansion.

confidence.data_freshness: Data current through 2023 tax year and 2024 ratings
data_gaps: Detailed 2024 financials not yet fully integrated
confidence.notes: Strong alignment between third-party ratings and internal audits.

known_gaps: Detailed staff count not in 990 summary

alignment.explanation: Strong alignment for Muslim donors through <cite id="8">verified zakat eligibility</cite> and a focus on <cite id="9">underserved populations in Bangladesh</cite>.

credibility.explanation: Donors can trust OBAT Helpers due to their <cite id="10">Platinum Candid Seal</cite> and <cite id="11">fully independent board of 22 members</cite>.
credibility.improvement: To enhance credibility, the organization could improve its <cite id="15">accountability beacon score</cite> by publishing more detailed governance policies.

impact.explanation: The organization delivers high impact with a <cite id="16">cost of approximately $100.01 per beneficiary</cite> and direct provision of services.
impact.improvement: Impact measurement could be strengthened by increasing the <cite id="13">number of years for which outcome metrics are consistently tracked</cite>.

donor_fit_matrix.evidence_rigor: Grade B - Verified outcomes and documented theory of change

rich_narrative.headline: OBAT Helpers Inc. empowers marginalized communities through comprehensive education, healthcare, and poverty alleviation initiatives.

ideal_donor_profile.best_for_summary: Best for donors who want to support long-term educational and health infrastructure for displaced Rohingya and Bangladeshi communities through a highly efficient, zakat-eligible channel.
donor_motivations: Want to fulfill zakat obligations with a focus on education
Value low overhead and high fundraising efficiency
Care about the long-term welfare of displaced populations in Bangladesh
giving_considerations: Gifts support a mature organization with 20 years of experience
The organization is currently navigating a period of revenue contraction
Focus is highly localized to Bangladesh
ideal_donor_profile.not_ideal_for: Donors seeking to fund advocacy or those looking for global geographic diversification in a single gift.

impact_evidence.evidence_grade_explanation: Grade B reflects <cite id="13">14 outcome metrics tracked</cite> and a verified theory of change, though third-party RCTs are not present.
impact_evidence.theory_of_change_summary: OBAT aims to break the cycle of poverty through <cite id="1">integrated empowerment initiatives</cite> in education and health.
impact_evidence.why_evidence_matters: Tracking outcomes ensures that educational programs actually lead to community empowerment.

long_term_outlook.room_for_funding_explanation: Given the <cite id="14">recent decline in revenue</cite>, the organization has significant capacity to absorb new funding to restore and expand its programs.

peer_comparison.differentiator: Distinguished by an extremely low <cite id="7">fundraising costs of $0.06 per dollar</cite>.
similar_orgs: Helping Hand for Relief and Development

strengths.detail: The organization demonstrates remarkable fiscal discipline, spending only <cite id="7">$0.06 per $1 raised</cite>, which is significantly lower than industry averages.
OBAT Helpers holds a <cite id="10">Platinum Seal of Transparency from Candid</cite> and maintains <cite id="11">100% independent board governance</cite>.
The charity maintains <cite id="12">5.7 months of working capital</cite>, ensuring stability for its long-term educational projects.

strengths_deep_dive: OBAT Helpers' impact is rooted in its direct service delivery model. By operating <cite id="2">50 distinct educational and training projects</cite>, they provide consistent support to displaced populations. Their financial health is further validated by <cite id="12">5.7 months of operating reserves</cite>, which protects their programs from sudden funding fluctuations. Furthermore, the organization tracks <cite id="13">14 distinct outcome metrics</cite> through Candid, demonstrating a commitment to measuring actual change rather than just activities.
rich_narrative.summary: founded in 2004, OBAT Helpers Inc. is a dedicated humanitarian organization focused on <cite id="1">lifting displaced and impoverished communities out of poverty</cite> in Bangladesh. The organization operates a comprehensive service model that includes <cite id="2">50 educational and training projects</cite> and <cite id="3">3 health clinics</cite> specifically targeting Internally Displaced Persons (IDPs) and Rohingya refugees. OBAT Helpers maintains a strong commitment to financial transparency and efficiency, evidenced by its <cite id="4">overall score of 90.90.33333333333333/100 from Charity Navigator</cite>. The charity's operations are characterized by a <cite id="5">program expense ratio of 82.1%</cite> according to recent tax filings, though Charity Navigator notes a higher historical <cite id="6">program efficiency of 82.1%</cite>. Their fundraising model is exceptionally lean, requiring only <cite id="7">$0.06 to raise every $1</cite> in donations. As a <cite id="8">zakat-eligible organization</cite>, OBAT provides a critical channel for Muslim donors to support <cite id="9">marginalized communities through education and healthcare</cite> in one of the world's most densely populated refugee corridors.
